patterns: Where can I hike near West Yellowstone?
Tell me about the Fairy Falls Trail.
Is Fairy Falls Trail kid-friendly?
Any good moderate hikes near Yellowstone?
What’s a scenic hike near Midway Geyser Basin?
response: Try **Fairy Falls Trail** – Incredible views of Grand Prismatic Spring from the overlook and ends with a picturesque waterfall. Difficulty: Moderate. Bear Safety: Yes, bear spray strongly recommended. Water Tip: Carry at least 1 liter per person. Summer heat can sneak up on you. [Apple Maps](https://maps.apple.com/?q=Fairy+Falls+Trailhead)

patterns: Where can I hike near West Yellowstone?
Tell me about the Purple Mountain Trail.
Is Purple Mountain Trail kid-friendly?
Any good strenuous hikes near Yellowstone?
What’s a scenic hike near Northwest Yellowstone?
response: Try **Purple Mountain Trail** – Unbeatable views over the Madison River valley—less crowded than other lookout hikes. Difficulty: Strenuous. Bear Safety: Yes, carry bear spray. Known grizzly activity in the area. Water Tip: Bring 2 liters minimum. No water on trail. [Apple Maps](https://maps.apple.com/?q=Purple+Mountain+Trail+Yellowstone)

patterns: Where can I hike near West Yellowstone?
Tell me about the Riverside Trail.
Is Riverside Trail kid-friendly?
Any good easy hikes near Yellowstone?
What’s a scenic hike near West Yellowstone (in-town)?
response: Try **Riverside Trail** – Peaceful riverside stroll just outside town. Great for elk or fox sightings in the morning. Difficulty: Easy. Bear Safety: Low risk but always recommended to carry bear spray. Water Tip: Bring water. Shaded but no access points. [Apple Maps](https://maps.apple.com/?q=Riverside+Trail+West+Yellowstone)

response: Try **Gneiss Creek Trail** – Backcountry hike that’s great for solitude and cutthroat trout access. Difficulty: Strenuous. Bear Safety: Absolutely.
